en.hero_subtitle: Your Trusted Partner in Logistics Solutions
en.comprehensive_solutions: Comprehensive solutions for optimal energy efficiency
en.main-description: At Logikent, we specialize in shipping. As an industry freight forwarder, we provide a broad range of logistics services to businesses importing or exporting from the country. Take advantage of our air freight, trucking, customs clearance, railways, container shipping or last mile delivery solutions for unhindered business in Uzbekistan.
en.main-cert1: We offer unique solutions for your business
en.main-cert2: Excellence in Freight and Delivery Services
en.service-subtitle: Comprehensive solutions for optimal energy performance
en.service-card1-text: We offer reliable and efficient air freight services
en.service-card1-list3: Express and priority air transport with minimal transit time.
en.service-card2-list4: Transportation of oversized, dangerous, and temperature-sensitive cargo
en.service-card3-list2: Calculation of customs duties and taxes
en.service-card4-text: Complete logistics solutions from sender to destination
en.service-card4-list1: International transportation (air, sea, road and container)
en.service-card5-text: International trade and regulation, insurance, cost optimization, contracts, and supplier management
en.service-card5-list1: Single point of contact ‚Äî management of all logistics providers (3PL, carriers, warehouses)
en.service-card5-list2: Selection of optimal transport modes and routes
en.service-card5-list3: Supplier management ‚Äî contract handling and partner performance control
en.service-card6-text: Rail, road, and sea combined transport (container-based)
en.service-card6-list1: Full cargo support: route booking, documentation, and schedule control
en.service-card6-list3: Tracking and monitoring of cargo status.
en.consolidation-subtitle: We optimize your supply chain ‚Äî saving you time and money.

en.consolidation-card1-text1: Reducing transportation costs ‚Äî pay only for your cargo space, not the entire container.
en.consolidation-card1-text2: Transparency and control ‚Äî full tracking at every stage, from supplier to warehouse in Uzbekistan.
en.consolidation-card1-text3: Transparency and control ‚Äî full tracking at every stage, from supplier to warehouse in Uzbekistan.
en.consolidation-card2-text1: Cargo collection and storage at our warehouses in the EU, Turkey, Russia, the UAE, and China
en.consolidation-card2-text2: Quality inspection and photo reports before shipment
en.consolidation-card2-text4: International transportation by road, air, and sea
en.mission-card1-text: Our mission is to contribute to the development of our clients' businesses by providing them with fast, reliable, and efficient logistics solutions.
en.mission-card2-text: To become the most reliable and innovative logistics company in Central Asia, to take a leading position in the market with advanced technologies and quality of service.
en.mission-card3-text: We value professionalism, responsibility, and customer focus. We strive to build long-term partnerships with our clients based on trust and mutual respect.
en.partners-subtitle: We collaborate with industry leaders to deliver exceptional logistics solutions.
en.contact-desc: We‚Äôre here to help! Reach out to us for any inquiries or support.

en.footer-text: Delivering reliability across every route ‚Äî because your business deserves logistics you can trust.

uz.comprehensive_solutions: Optimal energiya samaradorligi uchun kompleks yechimlar
uz.main-description: Logikent kompaniyasi yuk tashish bo'yicha ixtisoslashgan. Sanoat ekspeditori sifatida biz import yoki eksport qiluvchi kompaniyalarga keng ko'lamli logistika xizmatlarini taqdim etamiz. Havo yuklari, avtomobil transporti, bojxona rasmiylashtiruvi, temir yo'l, konteyner tashish yoki oxirgi mil yetkazib berish xizmatlarimizdan foydalaning va O'zbekistonda biznesingizni to'xtovsiz yuriting.
uz.main-cert1: Biz sizning biznesingiz uchun noyob yechimlarni taklif qilamiz
uz.main-cert2: Yuk tashish va yetkazib berishning yuqori sifati
uz.main-cert3: Ekologik toza va ishonchli transport yechimlari

uz.service-card5-list2: Eng qulay transport turlari va yo‚Äònalishlarini tanlash
uz.service-card5-list3: Yetkazib beruvchilarni boshqarish ‚Äî shartnomalarni yuritish va hamkorlar faoliyatini nazorat qilish

uz.service-card6-list3: Yuk holatini kuzatish va monitoring qilish.

uz.consolidation-card1-text1: Transport xarajatlarini kamaytirish ‚Äî faqat o'zingizning yuk joyingiz uchun to'laysiz, butun konteyner uchun emas.
uz.consolidation-card1-text2: Shaffoflik va nazorat ‚Äî har bir bosqichda to'liq kuzatuv, yetkazib beruvchidan O'zbekistondagi omborga qadar.

uz.mission-card1-text: Bizning missiyamiz ‚Äî mijozlarimiz biznesini rivojlantirishga hissa qo'shish, ularga tez, ishonchli va samarali logistika yechimlarini taqdim etish.
uz.mission-card2-text: Markaziy Osiyoda eng ishonchli va innovatsion logistika kompaniyasi bo'lish, ilg'or texnologiyalar va xizmat sifati bilan bozorda yetakchi o'rinni egallash.
uz.mission-card3-text: Biz professionallik, mas'uliyat va mijozlarga e'tibor berishni qadrlaymiz. Biz mijozlarimiz bilan uzoq muddatli hamkorlikni ishonch va o'zaro hurmat asosida qurishga intilamiz.
uz.partners-subtitle: Biz sanoat yetakchilari bilan hamkorlik qilib, ajoyib logistika yechimlarini taqdim etamiz.
uz.contact-desc: Biz har doim yordam berishga tayyormiz! Har qanday savol yoki yordam uchun bizga murojaat qiling.
uz.footer-text: Har bir yo'nalishda ishonchlilik ‚Äî biznesingiz ishonchli logistika xizmatiga loyiq.
